basicgraph

Class GraphAdjMatrix

  • java.lang.Object
    • basicgraph.Graph
      • basicgraph.GraphAdjMatrix

  • public class GraphAdjMatrix
extends Graph
    A class that implements a directed graph. The graph may have self-loops, parallel edges. Vertices are labeled by integers 0 .. n-1 and may also have String labels. The edges of the graph are not labeled. Representation of edges via an adjacency matrix.

    • Nested Class Summary

      • Nested classes/interfaces inherited from class basicgraph.Graph

    • Constructor Detail

      • GraphAdjMatrix

        public GraphAdjMatrix()

    • Method Detail

      • addVertex

        public void addVertex()
        Implement the abstract method for adding a vertex. If need to increase dimensions of matrix, double them to amortize cost.

      • addEdge

        public void addEdge(int v,
                    int w)
        Implement the abstract method for adding an edge. Allows for multiple edges between two points: the entry at row v, column w stores the number of such edges.
        Parameters:
        v - the index of the start point for the edge.
        w - the index of the end point for the edge.

      • getInNeighbors

        public java.util.List<java.lang.Integer> getInNeighbors(int v)
        Implement the abstract method for finding all in-neighbors of a vertex. If there are multiple edges from another vertex to this one, the neighbor appears once in the list for each of these edges.
        Parameters:
        v - the index of vertex.

      • getDistance2

        public java.util.List<java.lang.Integer> getDistance2(int v)
        Implement the abstract method for finding all vertices reachable by two hops from v. Use matrix multiplication to record length 2 paths.
        Parameters:
        v - the index of vertex.

      • adjacencyString

        public java.lang.String adjacencyString()
        Generate string representation of adjacency matrix
        Returns:
        the String
